divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my girlfriend were sitting on our front porch smoking a cig . My girlfriend was showing me how she thought the moon looked different because of the upside down finger nail shape. As i was looking up i saw a bright light and black then two more bight lights go over head and one flashing red one it was a perfect triangle silent low flying we watched it go across the sky we could not hear anything it flew on a straight path we watched it for about 5min. A b52 but when they fly over they are loud. It just flew low slow and silent and it was a perfect triangle. Shocked and cant fully say mad cause i didnt have my phone. It flew out of sight
Summary: three bright lights moving slow and silent
trends: There have been 25 other sightings in Stockton
There was one other sighting in Stockton on or around January 9th 2011
